dmca.title: Notice of Infringing Material
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: bizdev [mailto:bizdev@bigresources.com] 
Sent: Saturday, April 14, 2007 9:34 PM
To: Copyright
Subject: Notice of Infringing Material

 

April 14, 2007

 

Andrea Almeida, Associate General Counsel

ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc. and all subsidiaries

1333 Stemmons Freeway

Suite 110, Dallas, TX 75207

Phone: (214) 782-7800

Fax: (214) 782-7756

E-mail address: copyright@theplanet.com

 

Big Resources, Inc.

PO Box 140813

Gainesville, FL 32614

P: 775-490-8702

F: 309-409-2099

 

Dear Abuse Department,

 

This notice is to satisfy the requirements for a complete DMCA complaint, as set
forth by the DMCA act of 1998, which may be found at
http://www.loc.gov/copyright/legislation/dmca.pdf, for the IMMEDIATE removal of the
website http://www.allfreetemplates.org which is distributing products that are the
sole and exclusive copyrighted materials of Big Resources, Inc, and
http://www.boxedart.com.  

 

Each point from the Digital Millenium Copyright Act is addressed below:

 

1. A physical or electronic signature of a person authorized to act on behalf of the
owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed. 

 

Digital signature contained on bottom of page.

 

2. Identification of the copyrighted work claimed to have been infringed, or, if
multiple copyrighted works at a single online site are covered by a single
notification, a representative list of such works at that site. 

 

This notice is concerning various copyrighted products and graphics originally
obtained from the website http://ww.boxedart.com. Proof of copyright is provided at
the end of this notice (copyright id: TX-6-099-319)

 

3. Identification of the material that is claimed to be infringing or to be the
subject of infringing activity and that is to be removed or access to which is to be
disabled, and information reasonably sufficient to permit ThePlanet to locate the
material. 

 

Big Resources, Inc., is providing this letter of notification pursuant to the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act and 17 USC
